required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Investigate the Food Effect on the Pharmacokinetics of Ensartinib Capsules in Chinese Healthy Volunteers.
clinical_study.official_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study in Chinese Healthy Male and Female Volunteers to Investigate the Effect of Food on the Pharmacokinetics of Ensartinib Capsules.

brief_summary.textblock: The main objective of this study is to evaluate the Effect of Food on the Pharmacokinetics of Ensartinib Capsules.

detailed_description.textblock: The main objective of this study is to evaluate the Effect of Food on the Pharmacokinetics of Ensartinib Capsules in Chinese Healthy Volunteers. In addition, the safety of Ensartinib Capsules in Chinese Healthy Volunteers who with High-fat meal or fasting state will also be evaluated.

primary_outcome.description: The effect of food on Cmax after high fat diet and fasting Blood sampling over a 120 hour period post dose in all dosing sessions

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) of Ensartinib
primary_outcome.description: The effect of food on AUC after high fat diet and fasting Blood sampling over a 120 hour period post dose in all dosing sessions
The effect of food on Tmax after high fat diet and fasting Blood sampling over a 120 hour period post dose in all dosing sessions
The effect of food on T1/2 after high fat diet and fasting Blood sampling over a 120 hour period post dose in all dosing sessions

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of randomization until the date of first documented progression or date of death from any cause, whichever came first, assessed up to 2 months
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v4.0

arm_group.arm_group_label: Period 1: fed control → Period 2: fasted control
arm_group.description: Period 1: administration of Ensartinib 225mg at 7:30am, 30 minutes after the breakfast；Period 2: administration of Ensartinib 225mg at 7:30am, without the breakfast

arm_group.arm_group_label: Period 1: fasted control → Period 2: fed control
arm_group.description: Period 1: administration of Ensartinib 225mg at 7:30am, without the breakfast；Period 2: administration of Ensartinib 225mg at 7:30am, 30 minutes after the breakfast

intervention.description: The two groups of subjects were given an equal dose of Ensartinib capsules (225 mg) after a single cross-over fasting or high-fat high-calorie diet in two different test cycles to examine the effect of food on the pharmacokinetics of Ensartinib.
intervention.arm_group_label: Period 1: fed control → Period 2: fasted control
Period 1: fasted control → Period 2: fed control

overall_official.affiliation: the Second Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University Medical College

facility.name: The 1st Phase Clinical Research Center of the Second Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University Medical College
